text: Nizhnye Solotvyno (Ukrainian: Нижнє Солотвино, Hungarian: Alsószlatina or Nagyszlatina) is a village in Zakarpattia Oblast, Ukraine. == History == It was settled in the second half of the 14th century. Its first written mention dates back to 1398 under the name Slatina. From the 17th century it was mentioned under the name Nagyszlatina. ==References== Category:Settlements of Uzhhorod District Category:Villages in Ukraine
title: Nizhnye Solotvyno
